body: Basically, I cannot connect to Avicus Network. Is it only me or the server is down?
body_tagged: Basically, I cannot connect to Avicus Network. Is it only me or the server is down?
title: Avicus Down?

replies.body: Pretty sure its the scheduled maintenance
replies.body_tagged: Pretty sure its the scheduled maintenance

replies.body: The server is currently under some maintenance. Expect the server to be down for a little while. It won't be too long though.
replies.body_tagged: The server is currently under some maintenance. Expect the server to be down for a little while. It won't be too long though.
